name: Clorinde
storytext: Vanquisher of Phantoms, Vigil of the Long Night
source: Reward for inviting Clorinde to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Oath of Hunting Shadows
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If this character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114121]</color> attached, this Skill costs 1 less $[K309].
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>. If this character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Vigil</color> attached, this Skill costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>.
skills.description: Deals 1 Physical DMG. If this character has Night Vigil attached, this Skill costs 1 less Unaligned Element.

skills.name: Hunter's Vigil
skills.descriptionraw: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114121]</color> to self, then remove all of your <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color>. Based on the number of stacks removed, deal $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] and heal yourself. (DMG and healing are capped at 4 points)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Night Vigil</color> to self, then remove all of your <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bond of Life</color>. Based on the number of stacks removed, deal {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> and heal yourself. (DMG and healing are capped at 4 points)
skills.description: Attach Night Vigil to self, then remove all of your Bond of Life. Based on the number of stacks removed, deal Electro DMG and heal yourself. (DMG and healing are capped at 4 points)

skills.name: Last Lightfall
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], and attaches 4 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C122]</color> to self.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 3 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>, and attaches 4 stacks of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Bond of Life</color> to self.
skills.description: Deals 3 Electro DMG, and attaches 4 stacks of Bond of Life to self.
